content: simple earflap hat knit from the top down means there is no seaming or picking up stitches braided ties allow this hat to tie on making it very functional for your busy little one ad an optional pom-pom for extra fun **translations** earflap hat in italiano 1 1 https //docs google com/file/d/0b37yqiko8pwtx2hpquriwe9satg/edit usp=sharing
